title: Understanding the stochastic dynamics of sequential decision-making processes: A path-integral analysis of multi-armed bandits. (arXiv:2208.06245v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: The multi-armed bandit (MAB) model is one of the most classical models to study decision-making in an uncertain environment. In this model, a player chooses one of $K$ possible arms of a bandit machine to play at each time step, where the corresponding arm returns a random reward to the player, potentially from a specific unknown distribution. The target of the player is to collect as many rewards as possible during the process. tldr: 本论文采用统计物理学技术进行了多臂老虎机模型的路径积分分析，得到了奖励历史的概率分布，揭示了勘探策略和奖励分布对决策过程表现的影响，同时开发了一种高效的计算方法，为更复杂的决策制定任务的算法开发提供了可能。
